verses.name: Joshua 21:27
verses.text: And unto the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the other half tribe of Manasseh they gave Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Beesh–terah with her suburbs; two cities.

verses.name: Joshua 21:28
verses.text: And out of the tribe of Issachar, Kishon with her suburbs, Dabareh with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:29
verses.text: Jarmuth with her suburbs, En–gannim with her suburbs; four cities.

verses.name: Joshua 21:30
verses.text: And out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with her suburbs, Abdon with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:31
verses.text: Helkath with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs; four cities.
